overview:
Michael heads up the sales and marketing teams at Wpromote.

He also manages the company’s strategic partnerships and alliances while working directly with many of Wpromote’s largest clients to develop their online marketing strategy. Michael’s vast experience in online marketing is eclipsed only by his gift of gab, and his workplace antics are infamous around the office.

With a BA in Communication from the University of Colorado, Michael is a board member of ThinkLA’s AdZoo, an organization of Los Angeles advertising industry executives. Michael is also a regular speaker at industry events and a member of Google’s Search Engine Marketing Council. When not at his desk, Michael can be found engaging anyone who will listen in a spirited conversation about the various plot holes in each Back to the Future movie.
